To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private EaseOfMovementValue _emv;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_emv = EMV(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_emv.IsReady)
{
    var current = _emv.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.emv = self.EMV(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.emv.IsReady:
    current = self.emv.Current.Value
